name: Doryphora
Relationship: Antidote: STRAM. Compare: AGAR.; APIS; CANTH.; LACH.; COCCION.

Urine: Urethra inflamed, with excruciating pain when urinating

details: The center of this drug's action seems to be in the urinary organs, and hence its employment in gonorrhea and gleet. Urethritis in children from local irritation and gleet. Great trembling in extremities. Prostration. Swelling of body. BURNING SENSATION.
